title: Endless Thread Presents: Pride Stories From 'Kind World'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In honor of Pride month, the Endless Thread team shares a pair of stories from another WBUR podcast -- Kind World. Co-hosts Yasmin Amer and Andrea Asuaje tell stories about the profound impact an act of kindness can have on us. Enjoy, and happy Pride to all!
itunes:author: WBUR
